text: Ne Abatsokaasi baboola mbu: “ Nyasaye achamanga shikhwakhalamile shiosi shiosi habundu wuwe tawe, efwe halala nohomba Abapapa befu, ne shikhwakhakanilekhwo shiosi shiosi tawe halali ye (akane)” kho mana endi nilwabakhola balia abali imbeli wabu. Kho shikali khubarumwa halali okhusia butswa oburume mubulafu
